alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, south central Gadsden, southeastern Liberty, southwestern Leon and northeastern Franklin Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Blountstown to 18 miles west of Crawfordville to 6 miles southwest of Carrabelle. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Brown House, St George Island St Pk, Panacea, Clio, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Wetumpka, Bloxham, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Telogia and Lake Talquin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
